title: Small Business Simulator
para1: The Small Business Simulator is intended to fill a small gap in the budding industrialist's workflow: How do you get the Money you need to found a MegaCorp if you don't have a MegaCorp to generate it?
para2: The Small Business Simulator accepts seed funding in the form of Gold and Emerald, and uses it to generate Money. See recipes and details on the Money page:
Note: Producing Money this way is much more expensive than using a MegaCorp, so you should switch to that as soon as possible.
